items.title: Event: LabKey sponsoring 2014 AIRI IT Meeting
items.description: LabKey looks forward to sponsoring the Association of Independent Research Institutes (AIRI) 2014 Information Technology Meeting in Seattle, May 8-9, 2014. This meeting's theme is "Seeking Balance â€“ Innovation vs. Practical Solutions to IT Challenges" and features presentations by IT innovators at leading research institutes (program). The Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center (FHCRC) will host the 2014 AIRI IT meeting

items.title: Panel and Talk: AMIA Joint Summits - April 9 and 10, 2014
items.description: Mark Igra will join a panel of experts to address sustainable strategies for open source projects in clinical and translational research. Separately, Elizabeth Nelson will explore how large research consortia are using LabKey Server to overcome data challenges in this domain.

items.title: Release: LabKey Server v14.1
items.description: The LabKey team is delighted to announce the release of LabKey Server v14.1.

items.title: Article: MedCity covers the LabKey story: "Open-sourced in Seattle"
items.description: Open-sourced in Seattle: A fated collision of software talent and life science researchers.

items.title: Lecture: Josh Eckels presents at SLAS 2014, Jan 21 in San Diego
items.description: On Tuesday, January 21, Josh Eckels will present at the Informatics Special Interest Group (SIG).

items.title: LabKey User Conference 2013: Videos now available
items.description: In these videos, guest presenters share how  they utilize the LabKey Server platform to perform collaborative and  reproducible research with globally distributed teams.

items.title: Panel: Open Science / Open Source - 10/24
items.description: Join us for Health 2.0's first panel in Seattle and a discussion of open science and open source tools for the health research.
